nodes.text: HoloNet News Special Report: Controversial Statue Finally Destroyed
HoloNet News Special Report: Controversial Statue Finally Destroyed is the fourth video from the Star Wars Rebels tie-in website, Holonetnews.com. It was posted on September 5, 2014.

Imperial broadcaster Alton Kastle gave a glowing report of the Imperial authorities' destruction of a controversial statue on the nearby planet of Garel by the Bith artist Janyor; which he termed an "eyesore". In recent years, the Imperial Coalition for Progress, a division of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order, had scrutinized the statue because it had allegedly fallen into disrepair and become an issue of public safety. A few dissidents staged an impromptu protest but were quickly neutralized by the local authorities.
The Aurebesh displayed onscreen throughout most of the report reads: NO IMAGE AVAILABLE.
